meanings.definition: A person who is under the age of thirteen.
meanings.sent1: The playground was filled with subteens playing tag.
meanings.sent2: She is considered a subteen because she is only twelve years old.
meanings.sent3: The subteen tried to act all grown up by wearing oversized sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: In the land of subteens, the swing set is the throne of fun.
meanings.sent5: The subteen's laughter echoed through the park, bringing joy to all.

meanings.sent1: The subteen group at the party was excited to play games.
meanings.sent2: He was not allowed to watch the movie because it was rated for subteen viewers.
meanings.sent3: The subteen cat tried to climb the tall tree but got stuck halfway.
meanings.sent4: The subteen sky was painted with hues of pink and orange as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The subteen students eagerly awaited the start of their school field trip.
